divs: sighting details (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). at 2015 hrs. local time (mst) on 8\192f2000, my daughter, her boyfriend and i were standing on our driveway lookingeast. i looked up and noticed a fast moving light going from the west to theeast. i observed it travel an arc of over 90 degrees in less than one minute. during most of the ovservation i was using minox 10x25 glasses. the objectappeared to be a greenish white color. it seemed to be quite high and no soundwas heard. i am unable to give an estimate of its altitude. using my 10x25glasses i wa
